instructions.reason_for_call: You received two tablets and you only need one. You want to return the more expensive one and refund to credit card. If refund to credit card is not possible, you become angry and return everything on that order and refund to GC.
instructions.known_info: You name is Chen Silva and your zip code is 46281.
instructions.unknown_info: You do not remember your email address

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi! I actually received two tablets in my order, but I only need one. The problem is, one of them is more expensive, and I want to return that one and get a refund to my credit card. Can you help me with that?

message.content: Hi! I actually received two tablets in my order, but I only need one. The problem is, one of them is more expensive, and I want to return that one and get a refund to my credit card. Can you help me with that?

messages.content:
I can help with that. First I need to authenticate you and get a few details so I can check the order and start a return (returns are only allowed for delivered orders).

Please provide:
1) The email on your account (or, if you prefer, your first name, last name, and zip code). I need this to locate your user id.  
2) The order id (for example: #W0000000).  
3) Which tablet/item you want to return — either the item id (e.g. "1008292230") or tell me which one is more expensive (describe color/model) so I can identify the item in the order.  
4) Confirm you want the refund to go to your credit card (if you have more than one credit card on file, tell me which one or provide the payment method id such as "credit_card_0000000").

Once I find your account and order I will confirm the order status and the specific item details, then I will list the return action (order id, item id(s) to return, refund destination) and ask you to confirm (yes) before I submit the return request.

messages.content:
Verify the following before outputting ###STOP###:

1. GOAL SATISFIED: The scenario instruction goal is fully satisfied (the customer's request has been completed as specified in your scenario).

2. NO PENDING EXECUTION: The agent has no pending action to perform. If the agent said they would do something (e.g. cancel an order, process a return), wait until they have confirmed it is done or you have seen the outcome. Do not stop while the agent might still be about to execute something.

3. CORRECT TERMINATION TYPE: You are ending because the task is complete. If you are being transferred to a human, use ###TRANSFER### instead. If the scenario does not provide enough information to continue, use ###OUT-OF-SCOPE### instead.

Only if all checks pass, output ###STOP### in your next message. If any check fails, continue the conversation (e.g. thank the agent and wait, or ask for confirmation).

messages.content:
{"message":"You can upload a photo of the packing slip or tablet box so I can identify the order and item ID. Please follow these guidelines: 

1) How to upload: use the “Attach” / “Upload” / paperclip” button in this chat (or the file/photo icon) and select the photo or PDF from your device. If your platform doesn’t show an upload button, tell me and I’ll give alternate options. 

2) Accepted file types & size: JPEG, PNG, or PDF. Try to keep files under ~10 MB. 

3) What to include in the photo (make sure it’s legible):
   - The packing slip showing the order ID (e.g. #W0000000) or item/SKU numbers
   - Or the tablet box label showing model, color (black), storage (256GB), and any SKU/item number
   - Your name or shipping address (optional) so I can match to your account

4) Privacy tip: don’t include full credit card numbers or other sensitive info in the photo—last 4 digits are fine. 

5) Next steps after upload: I’ll identify the order and the specific item_id for the black 256GB tablet, then list the return details (order id, item id, refund to Mastercard ending 2732) and ask you to confirm (yes) before I submit the return. 

Upload the photo when you’re ready, and I’ll proceed."}
